Package: com.github.amkay.gradle.git.release.notes.dsl

[Groovy] Class ReleaseNotes

    • com.github.amkay.gradle.git.release.notes.dsl.ReleaseNotes

    • A holder for configuring the extraction of various categories of release notes, e.g. new features and bugfixes.

      Authors:
      Max KÃ¤ufer

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          String  exclude
          A regular expression that commit messages must not match to be included as a release note.
          String  include
          A regular expression that commit messages must match to be included as a release note.
          String  remove
          A regular expression that is used to remove text from the extracted commit messages.

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          ReleaseNotes (String include, String exclude, String remove)

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          void exclude(String exclude)
          Helper method to allow keyword-based configuration of the exclude property.
          void include(String include)
          Helper method to allow keyword-based configuration of the include property.
          void remove(String remove)
          Helper method to allow keyword-based configuration of the remove property.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name
          class Object wait, wait, wait, equals, toString, hashCode, getClass, notify, notifyAll

      • Property Detail

        • String exclude

          A regular expression that commit messages must not match to be included as a release note. All commit messages – whether they match the regular expression set in include or not – that match this expression are excluded.

        • String include

          A regular expression that commit messages must match to be included as a release note.

        • String remove

          A regular expression that is used to remove text from the extracted commit messages. All substrings that match this expression are removed from the commit messages.

      • Constructor Detail

        • ReleaseNotes(String include, String exclude, String remove)

      • Method Detail

        • @SuppressWarnings('ConfusingMethodName') void exclude(String exclude)

          Helper method to allow keyword-based configuration of the exclude property.

          Helper method to allow keyword-based configuration of the include property.

          Parameters:
          include

        • @SuppressWarnings('ConfusingMethodName') void remove(String remove)

          Helper method to allow keyword-based configuration of the remove property.

          Parameters:
          remove
